summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help the federal government save money, address issues on our High Risk List, and significantly improve government operations. This letter to the Office of Personnel Management outlines 16 open recommendations that it should prioritize. title: Priority Open Recommendations: Office of Personnel Management
